<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="catalog_ui_policy_action"><catalog_ui_policy_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><catalog_item/><catalog_variable>IO:259d3dddc34112103816554d0501310a</catalog_variable><cleared>false</cleared><disabled>ignore</disabled><field/><field_message/><field_message_type>none</field_message_type><mandatory>ignore</mandatory><order>100</order><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-04 00:13:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>b1ffb1d1c38112103816554d050131c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>weight_capacity</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Lilly Pad Logistics" source="x_1394608_lilly_pa">18cda146c3f012103816554d05013118</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Lilly Pad Logistics">18cda146c3f012103816554d05013118</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_action_b1ffb1d1c38112103816554d050131c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-04 00:13:28</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_policy display_value="Weight capacity">f8cfbd91c38112103816554d05013147</ui_policy><value>if (g_form.getValue('select_a_size') == 'Small') {
   g_form.setValue('weight_capacity', '100 kg');
} else if (g_form.getValue('select_a_size') == 'Medium') {
   g_form.setValue('weight_capacity', '500 kg');
} else if (g_form.getValue('select_a_size') == 'Large') {
   g_form.setValue('weight_capacity', '1000 kg');
}
</value><value_action>set_value</value_action><variable>weight_capacity</variable><variable_set display_value="Set for pallets">86a2231fc3f412103816554d050131f9</variable_set><visible>ignore</visible></catalog_ui_policy_action><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b1ffb1d1c38112103816554d050131c3"/></record_update>
